actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to make individuals eligible for medical care in facilities of the uniformed services for injuries incurred during inactive- duty training and travel to and from such training.

summary.text: Makes individuals eligible for medical care in facilities of the uniformed services for injuries incurred during inactive-duty training and travel to and from such training. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1072(3))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to make individuals eligible for medical care in facilities of the uniformed services for injuries incurred during inactive- duty training and travel to and from such training.
